identity.name: BLVX
identity.aesthetic: A24 Film Studio meets Minimalist Streetwear

headings.notes: Used for page titles, section headers, and major calls to action.

body.notes: Used for all post content, comments, and UI labels.

mono.notes: Used for timestamps, stats, and 'Bonita' AI technical outputs.

rules: NO GRADIENTS. Flat, solid colors only.
High contrast is mandatory. Text must be legible.
Use pure black (#000000) for backgrounds, not dark grey.
Use dark grey (#333333) only for borders and dividers.

layout.spacing: Generous. Use p-6, p-8 for containers.

mobile.fab: Floating Action Button for New Post (Bottom Right)

layout.container_style: Sharp edges. No rounded corners on main containers. Max border-radius 4px for inner elements.

buttons.style: Rectangular, sharp edges or minimal rounding (rounded-sm).

inputs.style: bg-transparent border-b border-white/30 focus:border-white outline-none rounded-none

bonita_ai.representation: Minimalist geometric icon or pulsing orb (monochrome).
bonita_ai.interaction: Slide-over panel (mobile) or dedicated sidebar column (desktop).

visual_enhancers.texture: Global noise/grain overlay (opacity 0.05) to emulate film stock.

motion.rules: No bouncing. Fade-ins and slide-ups only.

visual_enhancers.borders: 1px solid borders are the primary separator. Avoid drop shadows.

media.image_style: High contrast, black and white preferred for UI elements. User content remains full color but framed in black.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure 4.5:1 ratio for text. Pure white on pure black passes easily.

tech_stack.frontend: React, Tailwind CSS, Shadcn/UI, Framer Motion

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the 'Oswald' font from Google Fonts immediately.
Override the default Shadcn 'radius' variable to 0rem or 0.25rem max.
Set the global body background to #000000.
Create a 'NoiseOverlay' component that sits fixed on top of everything with pointer-events-none.
Use the 'Bonita' AI panel as a key differentiator - it should feel integrated, not bolted on.
For the 'Feed', ensure images are full-width on mobile with sharp edges.
Authentication page should use the 'auth_bg' image with a dark overlay for text readability.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur) sparingly, only for overlays.
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
NEVER: use AI assistant Emoji characters like ðŸ¤–ðŸ§  etc for icons.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions, parallax effects, and entrance animations.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable. Cramped designs look cheap.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors, selection states, and loading animations: separates good from extraordinary.
Prioritize using pre-existing components from src/components/ui when applicable
Components MUST use named exports (export const ComponentName = ...)
Pages MUST use default exports (export default function PageName() {...})
